title: Total number of Home Depot stores in Canada by province 2018
summary: The Total number Province in the Depot stores was Province Alberta , who made 182 stores .
The most number Province was Quebec , with just 1 stores .

In second place was Province Ontario with 88 stores ; third place went to Province Total with 182 stores ; fourth place went to Province Prince_Edward_Island with 1 stores and fifth place went to Province British_Columbia , who was 26 stores .
gold: There were 182 Home Depot stores across Canada in 2018 . Ontario was home to 88 , the most stores by far . Alberta and British Columbia were ranked in second and third places , with 27 and 26 stores located in each province respectively .
